title: Secrets of Celebrity Sex Tapes
overview: A&E's new docuseries, "Secrets of Celebrity Sex Tapes," offers an in-depth exploration of some of the most infamous celebrity sex tapes of our timeincluding Pamela Anderson and Tommy Lee, Kim Kardashian, Colin Farrell, Farrah Abraham, Mimi Faust, and others. Across eight episodes, hear the story behind each tape and how these iconic moments ignited public obsession, sparked outrage in the cultural zeitgeist and altered the lives of those involved.
